GPUComputePassEncoder.summary: The GPUComputePassEncoder interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} encodes commands related to controlling the compute shader stage, as issued by a . It forms part of the overall encoding activity of a .

remarks.para: A compute pipeline contains a single compute stage in which a compute shader takes general data, processes it in parallel across a specified number of workgroups, then returns the result in one or more buffers.
A GPUComputePassEncoder object instance is created via the property.

GPUComputePassEncoderPopDebugGroup.summary:
The popDebugGroup() method of the
interface ends a compute pass debug group, which is begun with a call.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

GPUComputePassEncoderSetBindGroup.summary:
The setBindGroup() method of the
interface sets the to use for subsequent compute commands, for a given index.

GPUComputePassEncoderLabel.summary:
The label read-only property of the
interface is a string providing a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUComputePassEncoder object.

GPUComputePassEncoderLabel.value: A string. If no label value has previously been set, getting the label returns an empty string.

GPUComputePassEncoderInsertDebugMarker.summary:
The insertDebugMarker() method of the
interface marks a specific point in a series of encoded compute pass commands with a label.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

GPUComputePassEncoderDispatchWorkgroups.summary:
The dispatchWorkgroups() method of the
interface dispatches a specific grid of workgroups to perform the work being done by the current (i.e., set via ).

GPUComputePassEncoderSetPipeline.summary:
The setPipeline() method of the
interface sets the to use for this compute pass.

GPUComputePassEncoderEnd.summary:
The end() method of the
interface completes recording of the current compute pass command sequence.

GPUComputePassEncoderDispatchWorkgroupsI.summary:
The dispatchWorkgroupsIndirect() method of the
interface dispatches a grid of workgroups, defined by the parameters of a , to perform the work being done by the current (i.e., set via ).

GPUComputePassEncoderPushDebugGroup.summary:
The pushDebugGroup() method of the
interface begins a compute pass debug group, which is marked with a specified label, and will contain all subsequent encoded commands up until a method is invoked.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.
